channel.title: CVE Feed for Hgiga -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hgiga -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37292|2024-08-02T17:09:34.022Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability in HGiga iSherlock 4.5 (iSherlock-user modules), HGiga iSherlock 5.5 (iSherlock-user modules) allows OS Command Injection.This issue affects iSherlock 4.5: before iSherlock-user-4.5-174; iSherlock 5.5: before iSherlock-user-5.5-174.

item.title: CVE-2023-24838|2024-08-02T11:03:19.253Z -- hgiga -- powerstation
item.description: HGiga PowerStation has a vulnerability of Information Leakage. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain the administrator's credential. This credential can then be used to login PowerStation or Secure Shell to achieve remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-24837|2024-08-02T11:03:19.288Z -- hgiga -- powerstation
item.description: HGiga PowerStation remote management function has insufficient filtering for user input. An authenticated remote attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands to perform arbitrary system operation or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-24841|2024-08-02T11:03:19.289Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock query function for connection log has a vulnerability of insufficient filtering for user input. An authenticated remote attacker with administrator privilege can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands to perform arbitrary system operation or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-24839|2024-08-02T11:03:19.269Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock’s specific function has insufficient filtering for user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject JavaScript, conducting a reflected XSS attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-24842|2024-08-02T11:03:19.354Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock has vulnerability of insufficient access control. An unauthenticated remote user can exploit this vulnerability to access partial content of another user’s mail by changing user ID and mail ID within URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-24840|2024-08-02T11:03:19.290Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock mail query function has vulnerability of insufficient validation for user input. An authenticated remote attacker with administrator privilege can exploit this vulnerability to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-4298|2024-08-01T20:33:53.107Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The email search interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4296|2024-08-01T20:33:53.173Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The account management interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-4297|2024-08-01T20:33:53.076Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The system configuration interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-4299|2024-08-01T20:33:53.021Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The system configuration interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4299|2024-04-29T03:15:18.038Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The system configuration interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-26261|2024-06-28T02:07:12.109Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: The functionality for file download in HGiga OAKlouds' certain modules contains an Arbitrary File Read and Delete vulnerability. Attackers can put file path in specific request parameters, allowing them to download the file without login. Furthermore, the file will be deleted after being downloaded.

item.title: CVE-2024-26260|2024-06-28T02:06:33.958Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: The functionality for synchronization in HGiga OAKlouds' certain moudules has an OS Command Injection vulnerability, allowing remote attackers to inject system commands within specific request parameters. This enables the execution of arbitrary code on the remote server without permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-26261|2024-02-15T02:29:23.672Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: The functionality for file download in HGiga OAKlouds' certain modules contains an Arbitrary File Read and Delete vulnerability. Attackers can put file path in specific request parameters, allowing them to download the file without login. Furthermore, the file will be deleted after being downloaded.
